subject: hello smiles@speedy.uwaterloo.ca you've just received a postcard
body:
Hi,Smiles! you've just received a postcard.
To view the postcard click this link or copy it to your browser's address bar.
http://nhopo.steadpage.hk/?448914525659

The postcard will be kept for 10 weeks.

Please do not answer this e-mail.
---------------------------------
Loknowo.Postcards.Pre-holidays Postcards.
